pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Quantiles Curves // Non-parametric methods as local normal regression, polynomial local regression and penalized cubic B-splines regression are used to estimate quantiles curves. See Fan and Gijbels (1996) doi:10.1201/9780203748725 and Perperoglou et al.(2019) doi:10.1186/s12874-019-0666-3.
